description: Manage admin information for certificate issuers.

commands.name: az keyvault certificate issuer admin add
commands.summary: Add admin details for a specified certificate issuer.
commands.syntax:
az keyvault certificate issuer admin add --email
                                         --issuer-name
                                         --vault-name
                                         [--first-name]
                                         [--last-name]
                                         [--phone]

commands.name: az keyvault certificate issuer admin delete
commands.summary: Remove admin details for the specified certificate issuer.
commands.syntax:
az keyvault certificate issuer admin delete --email
                                            --issuer-name
                                            --vault-name

commands.name: az keyvault certificate issuer admin list
commands.summary: List admins for a specified certificate issuer.
commands.syntax:
az keyvault certificate issuer admin list --issuer-name
                                          --vault-name
